plot: Biologist/Explorer Niall McCann travels the world through some of the toughest terrain, researching animals to better understand their behavior. Now he's on a mission to find the Biggest and Baddest creatures on the planet.
plot_en: Biologist/Explorer Niall McCann travels the world through some of the toughest terrain, researching animals to better understand their behavior. Now he's on a mission to find the Biggest and Baddest creatures on the planet.
plot_es: Biologist/Explorer Niall McCann travels the world through some of the toughest terrain, researching animals to better understand their behavior. Now he's on a mission to find the Biggest and Baddest creatures on the planet.
title: Biggest and Baddest
